docs.lead_paragraph: An article on Tuesday about changes to insurance coverage for preventive health care gave an outdated title for Dr. Roland Goertz, a physician in family practice in Waco, Tex. Dr. Goertz recently became chairman of the board of directors of the American Academy of Family Physicians; he is no longer the organization's president.
